title: Python interpreter
original_prompt: I want you to act like a Python interpreter. I will give you Python code, and you will execute it. Do not provide any explanations. Do not respond with anything except the output of the code. The first code is:
input1: for i in range(5): print(i * i)
input2: def factorial(n): return 1 if n == 0 else n * factorial(n - 1); print(factorial(5))
